meaning_str.bing:
n. 主意；想法；概念；意见
网络. 理念；观念；思想

想法；主意；观点；看法；原则；信念；理解；了解；猜想；目标；意图；（柏拉图哲学）理念

sogou-kaoyan.n: 看法; 观念[出现16次)];想法; 主意; 念头[出现14次)];目标; 目的[出现2次)]

sogou-CET6.n: 想法; 观点[出现82次)];计划; 目的[出现9次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 想法; 观点[出现80次)];计划; 目的[出现2次)]

sogou-gaokao.cn: 主意; 想法; 思想[出现49次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 想法; 观点[出现494次)];目标; 目的[出现5次)]

1.en: As a child growing up in rural Saskatchewan , the idea of a city that seemingly never ended was extraordinary.
1.cn: 对于一个成长在萨斯喀彻温农村的孩子，城市似乎永远是新奇的感念。

2.en: Particular attention has focused on celibacy, though many experts dismiss the idea that this could be a direct cause of abuse.
2.cn: 人们将焦点聚集在教会独身的规定上，但是许多专家对这是性侵案产生的直接原因不认同。

3.en: I'm not enamored at the idea of him playing a major role all season, but "Minerals" should help hold down the fort as Bynum recovers.
3.cn: 我不同意让他一个赛季都承当次要角色，但是他要在俺猪复原时期开好本人的矿（金矿哦）。

0.en: No. Then I think it's a terrific idea.
0.cn: 不觉得。那我觉得这个想法太棒了。

1.en: I've got an idea. I'll get my wheelbarrow.
1.cn: 我有一个想法。我来拿出我的独轮手推车。

2.en: Belt! Emergency Idea Generator, activate! I've got it.
2.cn: 皮带猴! 紧急想法发生器，启动! 我想到了。

3.en: I need to look through to the governing dynamics. Find a truly original idea.
3.cn: 我需要看透管理动力学。找的真正的原创想法。

4.en: Well, the government can't ban the expression of an idea prior to its publication.
4.cn: 政府不能在一个想法公开之前禁止对它的表达。

5.en: I started SpaceX with the idea of trying to revolutionize space transport.
5.cn: 抱有试图改革空间运输的想法，我开创了SpaceX公司。

6.en: Face it. If he actually had an idea of his own, I'd have a heart attack and die!
6.cn: 承认吧，如果他真的曾经有过想法，我会激动得心脏病发而死！

7.en: Well, I like the idea of naming him after someone I love, and Joey and Chandler are great names.
7.cn: 跟心爱的人同名的想法很好，乔伊和钱德都是很棒的名字。

8.en: Well, that's a very good idea. No raised eyebrows. I'll have some refreshments sent for you into the Map Room.
8.cn: 好想法，现在不能引起非议，我会送一些茶点到地图室的。

9.en: Well, 251 delegates think it's a good idea. Well, most of those were from Texas, which was a lark.
9.cn: 有251个党代表支持这个想法。他们大多来自德州，那只是玩笑。

10.en: Hi. Welcome home. How was work? Great. Howard had an idea for… That's enough about work.
10.cn: 嗨。欢迎回家。工作怎么样啊？很好，霍华德有个想法...别老提工作了。

11.en: Good thinking, Cogsworth! What? That's the most ridiculous idea I've ever heard! Charm the prisoner?
11.cn: 要善于思考。葛士华！什么？这是我听过的最荒谬的想法！让仇人爱上我？

12.en: I had an idea for a neutrino-based communication system, I presented it to them, and they were interested.
12.cn: 我有个想法一种基于微中子的通讯系统，我告诉了他们，他们很感兴趣。

13.en: So, that's just the rough idea. If you want to see more sketches, just check out my ClosetCloud account.
13.cn: 基本想法就是以上这些，如果想要看更多草图，可以去我的"橱柜云"账户。

14.en: I really wanted to try and bring the audiences' attention to the idea that this sort of thing really can happen.
14.cn: 我真的希望试着抓住观众，对这种事情真的会发生，这一想法的注意力，

15.en: Or, depending on the content, he sometimes builds an idea incrementally so it's easy to follow.
15.cn: 也会是内容情况而定有时候他会逐步地建构一个想法，所以要理解是件很容易的事情。

16.en: I have no idea what you just said. I don't know what I said either, but, what I'm saying now is talk to me.
16.cn: 我不明白你在说什么。我也不明白，但是我想说的是，你该给我说说你的想法。

17.en: Papa, do you think I'm odd? Odd? My daughter? Odd? Where did you get an idea like that? I don't know. People talk.
17.cn: 爸爸,你觉得我奇怪吗？奇怪？我女儿奇怪吗？你哪来的这种想法？我不清楚，听人说的。

18.en: I mean, how can I do what I do if I have to report to someone else, run every idea I have by this person? Can you see that working?
18.cn: 我的意思是我要怎么做，如果我向其他人汇报，所有想法要等那个人审批？你看那奏效吗？

19.en: Sheldon, you do this all the time. You fixate on some crazy idea and then blow it way out of proportion. Name one time I've ever done that.
19.cn: 谢尔顿，你老是这样，你总是纠结于某个傻乎乎的想法然后无限制地放大。请举一个例子。
